A magical kingdom where ice cream rain falls every day, making the inhabitants happy and content.
A futuristic city where the citizens are able to control the weather by creating ice cream clouds and causing it to rain.
A magical school where students learn how to create and manipulate ice cream rain, using it for good causes such as drought relief or to make people smile.
A group of rebels who use ice cream rain as a weapon against an evil government, causing chaos and confusion among their enemies.
A young girl who discovers she has the power to create ice cream rain and uses it to help her friends and family in need, becoming a hero in the process.
